 2007-15622007-10-12LAB,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisAppointment of ELIZABETH MacPHERSON of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and orders that ELIZABETH MacPHERSON be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; effective January 1, 2008.
